title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian dish of sautéed pieces of beef served in a sauce with smetana (sour cream).

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of vegetables sautéed in a wok with soy sauce and sesame oil.

title: Tiramisu
summary: An Italian dessert made of ladyfingers dipped in coffee, layered with a whipped mixture of eggs, sugar, and mascarpone cheese, flavored with cocoa.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A stir-fried rice noodle dish commonly served as street food in Thailand.

title: Moussaka
summary: A Greek dish consisting of layers of eggplant, minced meat, tomato sauce, and béchamel sauce.

title: Falafel
summary: Deep-fried balls made from ground chickpeas, herbs, and spices, often served in pita bread.

title: Butter Chicken
summary: A dish from the Indian subcontinent, consisting of chicken in a mildly spiced tomato sauce.
